value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!
value.excerpt: Think you need to always refresh your Power BI dataset even why just adding a measure? Patrick shows how you can deploy schema changes without needing to perform the refresh with Power BI Premium and the ALM Toolkit. value.title: Download PBIX reports - Minute Monday
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can download a PBIX (Power BI Desktop file) from the Power BI service for a given report.
